Create a draft pull request

Source: R/create_draft_pr.R
create_draft_pr.Rd

This function creates a draft pull request for the current version of the package.

Usage

create_draft_pr(x = ".")

Arguments

x

The path to the package.

See also

Other git: clean_git(), get_branches_tags(), is_repository(), is_workdir_clean(), new_branch(), set_tag()
